name: Kebabapalooza
description:
Kebabapalooza

WEEK 11 PROMPT:  "Food"

FOCUS:  Not going to lie, it was all over the place

Kebabapalooza started off as variant on a drag-and-release golf game. That was the initial idea kernel. In the game, players must collect all of the food in the level with their bow and arrow and then land on the fire pit to "cook" the food. I had this grandiose plan of having a lot of fun and unique interactions with the arrow  and its skewered food; however, I realized a bit too late that a lot of those ideas really only worked in 3D. I had gotten too deep in development to turn back at that point, so I kept going with the 2D style I started. That being said, I definitely think there's something here with this 2D prototype. I'm curious to dive a bit deeper into this concept after I've stepped away from it for a while. Ideas? Let me know lol

Left-Click & DragFire off the arrowRight-ClickCancel an arrow firingNumbers 1 - 7Select levelRRestart the level
